diamond.scene.painter

Class Painter

  • java.lang.Object
    • diamond.scene.painter.Painter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExampleWorld, ExampleWorld

    public abstract class Painter
extends java.lang.Object
    Die Klasse Painter dient dem Engine-Verwender als Ausgangspunkt zum Darstellen von Grafik
    Version:
    0.1 pre-alpha, 2013-02-21
    Author:
    Uwe Wilko Gruenefeld
